thread.title: Police Release Body-Camera Footage From Las Vegas Shooting

author: Zusha Elinson
title: Police Release Body-Camera Footage From Las Vegas Shooting
text:
Video footage of the tense moments as Las Vegas police closed in on Stephen Paddock after he killed 58 people was released by police Wednesday, providing a look at how officers responded to the deadliest mass shooting in modern U.S. history.
The body-camera footage shows a small group of heavily armed officers quietly assembling outside Paddockâ€™s 32nd-floor hotel suite in the Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino. Sweat can be seen streaming down the face of one officer.
